title: Future of Events 2016 – ‘Innovating events, developing professionals’
text:
Future of Events 2016 – ‘Innovating events, developing professionals’ Future of Events 2016 – ‘Innovating events, developing professionals’ Details Category: Venues & Events Created   15:45 On August 22 – 24, 2016 the inaugural edition of Future of Events 2016 will take place at Amsterdam RAI (The Netherlands). The theme of this brand new Conference and Tradeshow for Event professionals is ‘Innovating events, developing professionals’. The show management has succeeded in delivering a line up of well-known speakers within the Event industry, such as David Adler (BizBash), Robert Safian (Fast Company) and Corbin Ball (Corbin Ball Associates). 
All keynote speakers and workshop leaders will share their view on the Future of Events and/or the event industry. Steven Wickel, Chair & CEO of Future of Events: “Our goal is to give Event Professionals inspiration, ideas, concepts and innovative instruments that spice up tradeshows, meetings, conferences, events and, very important: give them a chance to develop themselves in just three days.” Besides an inspirational keynote-program and 40+workshops on career- and personal development, the event will feature an exhibition floor with innovative tools, products and services all connected to Experience, Engagement and Event Technology. Other features of the show include so-called 'hothouses' where the audience can experience new technologies first hand, and a Career Boulevard where International recruitment companies are represented. Future of Events 2016 is organized by Future of Events B.V. in Laren NH. The team consists of experienced event- and recruitment professionals, lead by Steven Wickel. Wickel also owns MICE Recruitment in the Netherlands and is moderator of 'Event Planning & Event Management’, the largerst LinkedIn group in the industry. Related articles
